name: Department of Justice v. House Committee on the Judiciary
question: Does an impeachment trial constitute a “judicial proceeding” under Rule 6(e)(3)(E)(i) of the Federal Rules of Criminal Procedure?
description: A case in which the Court will decide whether an impeachment trial before a legislative body is a “judicial proceeding” under Rule 6(e)(3)(E)(i) of the Federal Rules of Criminal Procedure.
